reviewText:
I have read his book The Harbinger and The Shemita and I found this documentary very compelling. It solidified to me that Jonathan Cahn truly is an anointed prophet of our day. He may not be a perfect human being,  but God had always used the ordinary to do the extraordinary. I think his message is desparately needed in today's world--REPENT AND CHOOSE GOD! He is not pushing any particular faith, but imploring all of us to get back to some faith and acknowledgement of God instead of thinking we are sufficient unto ourselves. I applaud him for his strong, passionate desire to bring souls to Christ. Keep blowing your trumpet Jonathan!
Mary Timmons from Danville, IL

I'm not sure why some have given this a 1 Star. Myself I believe in getting as much information on any subject that I can. I have read Every book and watched ever DVD Jonathon Cahn has written or made and I've never once heard him give any specific day or event that would happen. I believe in order to study Bible Prophecy properly you need as much information as possible. I know Jonathon Cahn gets his information straight from the Bible. I also know that he has never claimed to be a prophet although others have labeled him that and more. I believe he is a truthful trustworthy Minister. The reason I know this? Mathew 7-16
Truly inspiring!

Wonderful documentary about an exceptional voice in our day.  Watch Cahn's address in Statuary Hall in the Nation's Capitol (online video easily found) and come to your own conclusions.  Cahn makes no predictions of "dates," by his own account, as he powerfully professes the promise of God's triumph in a world awry.  A man whose own life has been full of tumult from atheism to faith.  Now well known as a best-selling author and Messianic Rabbi shepherding many in New York and beyond.  Produced by the director of "Alone But Not Alone."  Well worth viewing by honest persons.

As a Christian myself I think others should beware of the cottage industry the "end times" has become. There's always another book or DVD that "they" want you to buy. I've bought plenty of books and some DVD's and watched prediction after prediction come and go. Now that shemita is gone and the blood moons are gone and jade helm is gone and all the other "events" that were suppose to happen in September 2015 have come and gone, what's next? I certainly believe in "touch not my anointed and do my prophets no harm", but equally important is to have discernment. And we are told to pray for it.
Enjoy all material by Jonathan Cahn.  He is an anointed man of God with insight for this hour.

This is the life-story of Jonathan Cahn, a Christian Rabbi who speaks and writes like an Old Testament prophet. I read all his books and watch as many of his videos as possible. You should do the same. .
great book, especially if you like "prophesy" type books.
GREAT!
THE DISCS WERE NOT EASY TO HEAR SO I STOPPED LISTENING.  I PREFER THE EBOOK VERSION BUT, I WAS NOT ABLE TO GET IT IN THAT FORMAT.
This wonderful story has God's finger prints on this man. It really shows how the lord moves through people.
This is a great book,I watched it two times he was a very smart man,get it you won't regret it,it's so good,
God's watchman

This DVD does a wonderful job of presenting the story of a man called by God to proclaim a warning to the United States and the clear hand of God upon him during this journey.  I would highly recommend this DVD to anyone who calls themself a Christian.  Not only is it a wake up call, but also an encouragement of God's faithfulness.
I found the movie interesting.  His personal journey is a testament to us all.  Anyone can be called into God's service at any time and any place.
A MUST read!!!!!
Yes I enjoyed it very much ... And I'm very pleased with Amazon ... I've never had a problem that has not been solved... Love going through Amazon for my purchase's

This film is a nice look into the life of Jonathan Cahn, author of 'The Harbinger' and 'The Mystery of the Shemitah'. It's a valuable look at his background and heritage, along with interviews and stories about the life of this Rabbi.

Very enjoyable background, if you like his work, it's a good bigger picture of the man.
This is a must for everybody  to watch. The true picture of whats  going on in  America

I feel that the video, gave us a more clearer picture of who Jonathan Can is, and why God chose him, for a time such as this.  I believe that everyone should  take the opportunity to view his called life story,  you will not be sorry.
great dvd
Love Rabbi Jonathan Cahn.  He is a light to this nation. We need to pay attention and read his book The Harbinger.

I was hoping for more hard information and less "story telling" in this book.  I suppose for someone on the fence, and not convinced of Bible Prophesy as of yet, the content of the book MAY somehow convince them of the authenticity of the Bible...but if that were the purpose of this book, I believe it should have been titled and marketed in some other manner.
I stopped reading less than half the way through because I'm interested in information, not a story.
Sorry

In our opinion, Jonathan Cahn is a prophet, sent by God to warn the world of upcoming disasters and to bring us all back to the Lord.
His books are riveting reading and he speaks the truth. Love to read his writings.

This man is a prophet of our times.
Amazing, and RIGHT!
I truly enjoyed this book.
Anyone who read 'The Harbinger' and was intrigued, should read 'The Harbinger Man' to illuminate understanding.
Excellent! If you are a Jonathan Cahn fan, this is a must have!  Great testimony shared by a Mighty Man of God!
very good
Really good
Wonderful! Great story about a truly great man of God.

This man is I believe, a modern day Prophet Isaiah for America, and his amazing  life story simply reveals that.
While the wags are sneering because the sky didn't fall in Sept. 2015, Cahn always said "we can't put God in a Box, He doesn't have to so anything on anyone else' schedule". Regardless, Judgment is falling on the USA. Just look at the presidential race. Is any individual of them running for the good of America, or only for being in control of it?  Of course, that means controlling each of us as well.
Great insight for everyone
Even better and more up to date than The Harbinger!  Just wonderful!
Great book.

Great DVD! Rabbi Jonathan Cahn is not a Johnny come lately but his fame skyrocketed with the writing of the first Harbinger book. He's a very real and honest man of God. He's an expert on the HEBREW ROOTS of CHRISTIANITY and a marvelous teacher of thus! We have studied under him for nearly 20 years. He the real deal and no ego or drive for fame. His story is a wonderful one and we highly recommend this telling of it.
Excellent man excellent story.
Loved it! Truly Jonathan Cahn is a man called by God as a witness in our time!
how humble he is.
Love this movie...if you read "The Harbinger" you need to see this movie about the author!
Wonderful story, we all have a purpose
A+
Fantastic video!
Excellent production re: Rabbi/Pastor Jonathan Cahn! This godly man's teaching is spot on!

The Harbinger Man is a wonderful well documented journey about the life of Rabbi Jonathan Cahn and all the lives that he has touched and continues to touch.

You will walk away from this highly recommended movie,amazed to see how GOD transformed an atheist into one of the greatest Prophets of our time.

He is the author of the New York Times best sellers "The Harbinger" and "The Mystery Of The Shemitah " and is the Senior Pastor of The Jerusalem Center,one of the largest Messianic Congregations in the Country,located in Wayne New Jersey.

Dennis Siegel
This was a very interesting biography. I have seen the Harbinger, Shemitah Unlocked, and Isaiah 9:10 and all of them are very intriguing. I have also read the book The Harbinger Decoded.
I really enjoyed this film. Jonathan Cahn is such a humble but powerful servant of God.
Best update to the Harbinger and wonderful backstory about the author. It's an outstanding video, stop listening to the detractors and enjoy.

I really enjoyed this, as it took some of the high points he'd touched upon, in how he came to the Lord and how he became inspired, to write the Harbinger and all the related items.  It also gave many of the high points he'd touched on in his several tv appearances and in Washington/NY and on Utube (Prayer Breakfast).  It is evident that he's still and has been, all along, awestruck abt being chosen to bring this msg and probably even add'l ones, to those who God may not have been able to reach, by any other means, so expediently.  I enjoyed the appearance of the guy who'd approached him in the airport, who knew the editor of Charisma, who'd been told by God to approach this strange fellow sitting nearby.  (It reminded me of Beth Moore's telling of how God told her to go brush a man's hair & it turned out he'd been released from a hospital and was concerned he wouldn't look presentable to his lifetime sweetheart, when she saw him...& she did it, to the amazement of the many who stood watching, with their jaws dropped, then tearing up, finally.)  Anyway, this just brought it all together in one place..all parties being those who played a part in it & It was just spell-binding. He also told of something about the mountain where he dedicated his life to the Lord, but I won't give that away, here.  ~I Enjoyed it!

Jonathan Cahn came out of nowhere. Who the heck is this guy? Writing a book that stays on the New York Times bestseller list for two years? It's absurd. And what the heck is the Shemitah?

This film is actually pretty important for Americans to watch, revealing the background of a man who has had a huge impact on Christianity within our country. Like many people, I knew the name but knew nothing about what he actually believed or taught. I found myself fascinated by a man who sees himself as nothing less than a kind of bridge between Jews and Christians, reconciling the oldest split in Western culture.

This is definitely worth watching, especially if you are interested in the future of the Christian faith in America

Great story! It covers the whole back story of the writing of the book, "The Harbinger." Demonstrably shows the hand of God moving in people's lives. Your eternal destiny may very well hinge on you watching this video.
An absolute 10.  The story of Jehovah God's Jewish Prophet to America.

Thank you Yeshua/Jesus for finding Rabbi Jonathan Cahn worthy to be appointed for this hour. Please heed his warnings. He says that if he knows and doesn't warn then he will be held responsible. He is more afraid of God than of man. He doesn't care if you believe him or not. It is his responsibility to warn about upcoming judgment even if no one listens. Please be wise and make sure you are right with God. God is knocking on your heart with every heart beat.

LOVE THIS HOLY MESSIANIC RABBI!  GOD HAS TRULY BLESSED HIM.  IN THIS MOVIE, YOU CAN WITNESS THE MIRACLES THAT HAVE GUIDED RABBI CAHN DURING HIS LIFE.  THERE ARE NO COINCIDENCES!  SUCH A HUMBLE AND BLESSED MAN.  GOD IS USING HIM TO GIVE THIS COUNTRY WARNING TO REPENT.

I have been following Jonathan for sometime now.
I have over 100 teachings of his on
CD's from his website.
The wisdom and teaching from this True man of God is like now other.
The Ruach Elohim is truly in Him and shows forth like Bright Light in This Current state of Darkness this world is in.
The True message of Hope shines through the Darkness.
Don't stop with this one DVD.
Go to Hope of the World website.
Then order all you can.
Deep understanding. profound understanding comes from this Man like NO ONE I have ever listen to.
He Stands on the shoulders of wisdom from the Word of God.
If you are seeking wisdom and understanding it all that is the One True God of Israel this is the Man to show you
The way.
There are not words in any language that can properly express my thoughts of this Great Man. He is Great because his deep love of God!
God truly smiles on him.
He is the voice of God in our time.
Your time will be well spent.
Your life will change as a new Understanding comes from His teachings!
I have been profoundly Changed by this true Man of God.
5 stars seems so just not enough!
Things I have sought all my life to understand became so clear through his teachings.
It changes you from a believer to a
KNOWER in the one True GOD and The Saviour Yeshua!!
Barukh Haba Be'Shem Adonai!
Good read.  I like all his books.
Very good, Christians need to read it.
Jonathan Cahn is an awesome purveyor of information and intrigue.  He has a prophetic quality and is gifted in the knowledge of The Word of God.
Read the book then watch this video
Fantastic video.  I think everyone should watch this.  It's not only about the man who write the Harbinger (which I also thing everyone should read) but a real wake-up call to this country.
Loved it! And Love reading his books as well never disappointed with anything he does!!
Interesting to find out more about Jonathan Cahn
This book is a guide into Gods plan for all of us !
Love, love, love Jonathan Cahn.
This was one of the best books that I read that year. A merge of American history and Jewish history that is told in an interesting way to keep you in suspence for the next page.
